bibl.title: Letter from William B. Bean to Philip Showalter Hench, January 23, 1951

div1.p: Bean informs Hench that he will discuss a commemoration of the centennial of Reed's birth with colleagues at the University of Virginia.

div1.head: Letter from William B. Bean to Philip Showalter Hench, January 23, 1951
div1.opener:
file
STATE UNIVERSITY OF IOWA
UNIVERSITY HOSPITALS
DEPARTMENT OF INTERNAL MEDICINE
----
IOWA CITY, IOWA
23 January 1951
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Phil:
div1.p:
Thank you very much for your letter of the
19th. I checked again in Kelly's life of Walter
Reed and found that his birthday was, indeed, 13
September 1851. I shall therefore take the matter
up with colleagues at Charlottesville and let you
hear from me concerning their response.

Again, you have my thanks for your kindness
and interest. Best wishes.
div1.closer: Sincerely, WILLIAM B. BEAN, M.D. WBB:v
